entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Crash on show dialog after back from background #15024
  • Image shadow is away from the photo on horizontal screen rotation #15023
  • Clean install: still getting Platform version is not present for one or more target frameworks, #15021
  • Slider StepWidth Property #15019
    Backlog
  • [iOS/Catalyst] Grid issue with calculating * values on iOS/MacCatalyst #15018
    Backlog
  • [Windows] Flyout Shell Content title is not broken over multiple lines. #15017
    Backlog
  • CollectionView SelectionChanged not working when item is in Frame #15016
    Backlog
  • UI elements sometimes not rendering when navigating to a XAML ContentPage with CameraView #15013
    Backlog
  • Can't submit a MacCatalyst app to AppStore. #15011
  • Error in the manifest when I try to register ActionBootCompleted (MAUI Android) #15009
  • Incorrect total height of FlexLayout. #15007
    Backlog
  • [iOS/Catalyst] Button ImageSource does not reset when setting to null. #15006
    Backlog

Closed

  • Issue on Datalist after Windows 10 upgrade of latest Webview2 #15005
  • MAUI - File picker - option to only to choose file and no more #14992
  • CollectionView Header overlapped with EmptyView #6247
    Backlog
  • Android MenuItem acts differently on real/virtual device #7292
    Backlog
  • Vertical size not working correctly in grid/stack layout #14991

PullRequests

Created

  • Make layout honor MaxWidth and MaxHeight requests #15022
    area/layout 🔲
  • Fix up Compatibility gallery #15020
  • [Android] Allow to use system fonts #15010
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/fonts 🅰️
  • Update CODEOWNERS #15008
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, community ✨, partner/tizen

Merged

  • Bump Microsoft.WindowsAppSDK from 1.3.230331000 to 1.3.230502000 #15012
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [CI] Do not rebuild the ms tasks on device tests. #14476
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • [Windows] fixing window glitches while moving or resizing #14861
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, community ✨
  • Fix iOS ListView cell gone hidden (#11287) #13669
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area/ListView
  • [WIP] Dev/update mappers #14948
  • Just trying out some things #15000
  • Fixed Android's StreamImageSourceService.LoadDrawableAsync() #14109
    area/image :framed_picture:
  • Use Platform* Graphics APIs to match with the rest of the platforms #12818
    t/breaking 💥, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • feat: adding IWindowCreator #14921
    community ✨
  • Don't retain parameters not passed as query string parameters #14965
    t/breaking 💥, p/1, area/shell 🐢, partner/cat 😻, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [Windows] Fix crash swapping MainPage #14262
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/navigation 🧭
  • CollectionView - Recycle DataTemplates when using template selector #12011
    area/collectionview 📃
  • Fix OnBackButtonPressed on iOS (#8296) #14137
    community ✨
  • Optimize iOS selection synchronization #14613
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/collectionview 📃, community ✨
  • [iOS] Clear BindingContext when cell is queued for reuse #14619
    community ✨
  • [Android] Fix issue invoking ReturnCommand #14972
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [Windows] Fix Border corners clipping issue #14403
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-border
  • [Android] Fix Border RoundRectangle CornerRadius issue #14995
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-border
  • Remove "IsPresented/ShouldShowSplitMode" check #13497
    area/FlyoutPage
  • [Android] Fix IsEnabled property on Android SearchBar #14616
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [Android] Correctly notify ImageButton border changes #14874
    t/bug, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Implement all permutations of InputTransparent and CascadeInputTransparent #14846
  • Add visual testing support, on top of Appium #14999
    area/testing
